details:
A vulnerability in Jira Seraph allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication by sending a specially crafted HTTP request. The affected products are Jira Core Server, Software Data Center, Software Server, the Service Management Server, and the Management Data Center. More specifically, the following versions are impacted:

Jira Core Server, Software Server, and Software Data Center before 8.13.18, the 8.14.x, 8.15.x, 8.16.x, 8.17.x, 8.18.x, 8.19.x, 8.20.x before 8.20.6, and 8.21.x.

Jira Service Management Server and Management Data Center before 4.13.18, the 4.14.x, 4.15.x, 4.16.x, 4.17.x, 4.18.x, 4.19.x, 4.20.x before 4.20.6, 4.21.x.
